description: Updated comprehensive threat detection rules with enhanced coverage

xql_queries.name: Advanced_Container_Escape_Detection
xql_queries.query: dataset = xdr_data | filter event_type = ENUM.PROCESS and action_process_image_name contains "docker" or action_process_image_name contains "containerd" | filter action_process_command_line contains "--privileged" or action_process_command_line contains "--cap-add=SYS_ADMIN" | fields agent_hostname, action_process_image_name, action_process_command_line, event_timestamp | limit 1000

xql_queries.name: Enhanced_APT29_Activity_Detection
xql_queries.query: dataset = xdr_data | filter event_type = ENUM.NETWORK and action_remote_ip in ("185.220.100.240", "185.220.100.241", "185.220.100.242") or action_remote_port in (443, 80, 8080) and actor_process_image_name contains "powershell" | fields agent_hostname, action_remote_ip, action_remote_port, actor_process_image_name, event_timestamp | limit 1000
